examples.example: 妈妈无微不至地照顾着生病的奶奶。

translate.english: Mother takes meticulous care of the sick grandma.

examples.example: 志愿者们尽心尽力地照顾着那些需要帮助的人们。

translate.english: The volunteers take good care of those people in need wholeheartedly.

examples.example: 朋友们对我关怀备至，在我困难时悉心照顾我。

translate.english: Friends take great care of me and look after me carefully when I am in difficulty.
